channel.title: Can someone fix this for me

item.title: Can someone fix this for me
item.dc:creator: @Vladie Vladie
item.description:
@Vladie wrote:

Ok so far I have this:

else if (NPCID == 522) { skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX; skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY; NpcWanneTalk = 520; sendFrame200(4883, 520); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(520), 4884); if (premium) { sendFrame126("Welcome to Dwarf Mines General Store", 4885); } else { sendFrame126("Welcome to Dwarf Mines General Store", 4886); } sendFrame75(520, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); }
but, I need someone to edit that and make it where once you click the ‘Continue’ button after you talk with the npc, make it open up ‘openUpShop(1);’

EDIT: If anyone can tell me how to make let’s say Iron Ore work in the dwarf mines (on the Dodian source) after I add the object and coords to ‘Objects.cfg’.

Thanks.[br][size=1]Posted on: November 13, 2007, 09:14:53 PM[/size][hr]anyone at all?

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone fix this for me
